confidentiality.notes: PII Credit card information first and last name, e-mail address, shipping and billing addresses, telephone number, credit or debit card number, credit or debit card security code.

discovery_notes: Notification from CORESense, Ltd. (the company which helps us manage and process our customer orders) they they had just discovered there had been unauthorized access by an outside source to the personal information
notes: VYC Tires, INC  Notification 2013-06-07 Discovery/Incident 2013-05-22 (Partner CORESense) Containment: 2013-05-23 (24h)  Data PII Credit card information first and last name, e-mail address, shipping and billing addresses, telephone number, credit or debit card number, credit or debit card security code.   Asset FTP server
summary: On May 22, 2013, late in the day, we received notification from CORESense, Ltd. (the company which helps us manage and process our customer orders) that they had just discovered there had been unauthorized access by an outside source to the personal information (including credit card and debit card information) of some of our customers.
